Razor Claws knocked back after being caugh off gaurd by the first missle. H=
e hits the ground leaving a skid mark across the ground, He roared with pai=
n as shrapnel from other missles hit around him. He rolled back to his feat=
 creating his forcefield. As long as his feat remained planted the shots wo=
uldn't be able to penetrate. "Ice, Lunarpine, I've got them distracted, any=
 time you'd like to join the fun, I'm ready to Party." He shouts over his c=
omm. He knew that his teamates had thier paws full no matter where they wer=
e.

  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@...=
m

=
  The Mini-Mafia split back up again. Kracken sees Razorclaw.

  Kracken: I=
 won't ask. Hey! Look! Razorclaw! Good target, mob! Start with one, don't t=
arget another till he's done!

  Kracken fires 2 missiles at Razorclaw. Hor=
n Dril fires a drill missile, with the power of about 2 missiles because it=
's packed with acidic material and explosives and just waiting to explode, =
and he fired this single missile at Razorclaw. Gigas fires a bolt of electr=
icity from his hand at Razorclaw. Grenade shoots a fireball at Razorclaw. B=
eholder 2 fires 3 beams, they travel in waves toward Razorclaw...

e fired 15 shots from his pistol at Teltoli.

 from the EMP.  Hearing what FZ said, Sharpedge opens

 Mafia:: 
    Sharpedge: Mafia, do not for Mobster yet.  We must wait until=

    weakened! Zardus' orders.

k mode and lobbed 2 missles at Razor Claw. Torca
